mapper.update:
update t_monit
ha_id = #{haId,jdbcType=CHAR},
plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=CHAR},
b_num = #{bNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Type_reg = #{typeReg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ucl = #{ucl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lcl = #{lcl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_val = #{mVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_stat = #{mStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rder = #{rder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_date = #{rDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mder = #{mder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_date = #{mDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where monit_id = #{monitId,jdbcType=CHAR}

update t_monit set ha_id = #{haId,jdbcType=CHAR}, plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=CHAR}, b_num = #{bNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Type_reg = #{typeReg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ucl = #{ucl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lcl = #{lcl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_val = #{mVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_stat = #{mStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rder = #{rder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_date = #{rDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mder = #{mder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_date = #{mDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where monit_id = #{monitId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select * from t_ccp c join t_ha h on c.ha_id = h.ha_id join t_plan p on c.plan_id = p.p_id and c.rder = #{rder}
select * from t_ccp c join t_ha h on c.ha_id = h.ha_id join t_plan p on c.plan_id = p.p_id and c.ccp_id=#{ccpId}
